data: The huge concave of the rocky wall towering above them threw the woman’s scream far into the vast profound of the cañon.
The huge concave of the rocky wall towering above them threw the woman's scream far into the vast profound of the cañon.
The Chalice Of Courage: A Romance of Colorado
